id.phone.sdk

Class PhoneId

  • java.lang.Object
    • id.phone.sdk.PhoneId

  • public class PhoneId
extends java.lang.Object
    PhoneId single-tone class should be used as Phone.Id SDK access point. Initialize this class in your Application.onCreate with corresponding ClientId value and then use getInstance to get access to SDK. Use LocalBroadcastManager and your own BroadcastReceiver.onReceive to listen for SDK events.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PhoneId.TokenResponseCallback
      Callback to receive login token response asynchronously

      • getAccessToken

        public TokenResponse getAccessToken(PhoneId.TokenResponseCallback tokenResponseCallback)
        Get access token as TokenResponse object
        Parameters:
        tokenResponseCallback - TokenResponseCallback async callback to deliver access token to the caller thread
        Returns:
        TokenResponse object or null if access token is not available at the moment. If tokenResponseCallback != null token will be delivered to it
